verses.verse: The <WG3588> Elder <WG4245> To The Elect <WG1588> Lady <WG2959> And <WG2532> <WG3588> <WG5043> Her Children, <WG846> Whom <WG3739> I 1473 P-1NS Love 25 V-PAI-1S-C In 1722 PREP Truth, 225 N-DSF And 2532 CONJ Not 3756 PRT-N I 1473 P-1NS Only, 3441 A-NSM But 235 CONJ Also 2532 CONJ All 3956 A-NPM Those Who 3588 T-NPM Have Known 1097 V-RAP-NPM The 3588 T-ASF Truth, 225 N-ASF
For Sake Of <WG1223> The <WG3588> Truth <WG225> Which <WG3588> Abides <WG3306> In <WG1722> Us, <WG2254> And <WG2532> ' With <WG3326> Us <WG2257> Shall Be <WG2071> <WG1519> <WG3588> Forever. <WG165>

Shall Be <WG2071> ' With <WG3326> Us <WG2257> Grace, <WG5485> Mercy, <WG1656> Peace, <WG1515> From <WG3844> God The <WG2316> Father, <WG3962> And <WG2532> From The <WG3844> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> Of The <WG3588> Father, <WG3962> In <WG1722> Truth <WG225> And <WG2532> Love. <WG26>

I Rejoiced <WG5463> Exceedingly <WG3029> That <WG3754> I Have Found <WG2147> Of <WG1537> <WG3588> <WG5043> Thy Children <WG4675> Walking <WG4043> In <WG1722> Truth, <WG225> As <WG2531> Commandment <WG1785> We Received <WG2983> From <WG3844> The <WG3588> Father <WG3962>

And <WG2532> Now <WG3568> I Beseech <WG2065> Thee, <WG4571> Lady, <WG2959> Not <WG3756> As <WG5613> A Commandment <WG1785> I Write <WG1125> To Thee <WG4671> New, <WG2537> But <WG235> That Which <WG3739> We Were Having <WG2192> ' From The <WG575> Beginning, <WG746> That <WG2443> We Should Love <WG25> One Another. <WG240>

And <WG2532> This <WG3778> Is <WG2076> <WG3588> Love <WG26> That <WG2443> We Should Walk <WG4043> According To <WG2596> <WG3588> <WG1785> His Commandments. <WG846> This <WG3778> Is <WG2076> The <WG3588> Commandment, <WG1785> Even As <WG2531> Ye Heard <WG191> ' From The <WG575> Beginning, <WG746> That <WG2443> In <WG1722> It <WG846> Ye Might Walk. <WG4043>

Because <WG3754> Many <WG4183> Deceivers <WG4108> Entered <WG1525> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> World, <WG2889> Those Who <WG3588> <WG3361> Do Not Confess <WG3670> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> Coming <WG2064> In <WG1722> Flesh <WG4561> This <WG3778> Is <WG2076> The <WG3588> Deceiver <WG4108> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Antichrist. <WG500>
See To <WG991> Yourselves, <WG1438> That <WG2443> Not <WG3361> We May Lose <WG622> What Things <WG3739> We Wrought, <WG2038> But <WG235> A Reward <WG3408> Full <WG4134> We May Receive. <WG618>

Anyone <WG3956> Who <WG3588> Transgresses, <WG3845> And <WG2532> <WG3361> Abides Not <WG3306> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Teaching <WG1322> Of The <WG3588> Christ, <WG5547> God <WG2316> Not <WG3756> Has. <WG2192> He That <WG3588> Abides <WG3306> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Teaching <WG1322> Of The <WG3588>, Christ, <WG5547> This One <WG3778> Both <WG2532> The <WG3588> Father <WG3962> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> Has. <WG2192>

If <WG1487> Anyone <WG5100> Comes <WG2064> To <WG4314> You, <WG5209> And <WG2532> This <WG3778> <WG3588> Teaching <WG1322> <WG3756> Does Not Bring, <WG5342> <WG3361> Do Not Receive <WG2983> Him <WG846> Into The <WG1519> House, <WG3614> And <WG2532> Hail! <WG5463> To Him <WG846> <WG3361> Say Not; <WG3004>
<WG3588> For He Who <WG1063> Says <WG3004> To Him <WG846> Hail! <WG5463> Partakes <WG2841> In <WG3588> Works <WG2041> His <WG846> <WG3588> Evil. <WG4190>

Many Things <WG4183> Having <WG2192> To You <WG5213> To Write, <WG1125> <WG3756> I Would Not <WG1014> With <WG1223> Paper <WG5489> And <WG2532> Ink; <WG3188> But <WG235> Hope <WG1679> To Come <WG2064> To <WG4314> You, <WG5209> And <WG2532> Mouth <WG4750> To <WG4314> Mouth <WG4750> To Speak, <WG2980> That <WG2443> <WG3588> Joy <WG5479> Our <WG2257> <WG5600> May Be Full. <WG4137>
Salute <WG782> Thee <WG4571> The <WG3588> Children <WG5043> <WG3588> Sister <WG79> Of Thine <WG4675> <WG3588> Elect. <WG1588> Amen. <WG281>
